_header: Harkeneth all that here been / What Luke sayeth is good to seen
_description: Gospel ‘Feria iia in Rogationibus’, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkneþ alle þat here benWhat Luc seiþ is good to
                    sen…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He vs kepe from synne and sorweÞat Ros from deþ an
                    Aster morwe. Amen.

Doyle,  I. A.,
